Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Computer, Human

    public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    this class simulate a player of the game there are two kind of player human and computer class player is the parent of HUMAN and COMPUTER classes
